principles: Emphasis on decentralization and community governance.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Leading DeFi protocol with multi-chain support.

economic_design.model: Fixed supply with staking incentives and protocol fees.
economic_design.details: No ongoing emissions; tokens can be staked in the Safety Module, which may be slashed in case of a shortfall event.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Operates under a DAO structure with legal entities in Switzerland and the UK.
token_design_thinking.team: Led by Stani Kulechov with a diverse team of developers and researchers.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Centralized exchange token for trading discounts and rewards.
principles: Centralized control with some token-based incentives.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Emerging exchange token with recent growth initiatives.

economic_design.model: Utility token with buyback and burn.
economic_design.details: Quarterly buyback and burn mechanism to reduce circulating supply; as of December 2024, 800 million tokens burned.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Centralized exchange with regulatory compliance measures.
token_design_thinking.power_structures: Centralized decision-making with some community input.
token_design_thinking.team: Operated by Bitget exchange with experienced professionals.

tokenomics.emissions: Starting in 2025, Bitget allocates 20% of quarterly profits to repurchase and burn BGB tokens.
tokenomics.burn: Ongoing quarterly burns; 800 million BGB tokens burned in December 2024, additional burns ongoing.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Decentralized oracle network connecting smart contracts to real-world data.
principles: Focus on decentralization, data integrity, and transparency.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Dominant oracle provider with extensive integrations.

economic_design.model: Fixed supply, distributed for network operation and incentives.
economic_design.details: No burn mechanism; tokens distributed as needed for node operator incentives and ecosystem growth.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Operates through Chainlink Labs with global partnerships.
token_design_thinking.team: Developed by Chainlink Labs with a global team.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Automated market maker optimized for stablecoin trading.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Key player in stablecoin AMMs with unique governance model.

economic_design.details: Continuous emissions to liquidity providers; veCRV locking mechanism reduces circulating supply.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: DAO governance with legal considerations for decentralized operations.
token_design_thinking.tech_design: Ethereum-based with focus on stablecoin swaps.
token_design_thinking.power_structures: Vote-escrowed token model influencing governance decisions.
token_design_thinking.team: Founded by Michael Egorov with a team of DeFi experts.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Tokenization of real-world assets and DeFi integration.
principles: Bridging traditional finance with decentralized systems.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Innovator in tokenized real-world assets and DeFi products.

economic_design.details: No burn mechanism; tokens used for governance and incentivizing ecosystem participants.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Compliance-focused approach bridging traditional and decentralized finance.
token_design_thinking.tech_design: Built on Ethereum with focus on tokenized assets.
token_design_thinking.team: Founded by Nathan Allman with a team experienced in finance and blockchain.

vesting.community_access_sale: Immediate unlock for CoinList purchasers; remainder released over 12 months.
vesting.ecosystem_growth: 24% unlocked at public launch; remaining vests over 48 months.
vesting.protocol_development: 12-month cliff, then linear vesting over 48 months.
vesting.private_sales: 12-month cliff, then linear vesting over 48 months.

tokenomics.emissions: No ongoing emissions beyond the defined vesting schedules.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Decentralized GPU rendering network for digital content creators.

economic_design.details: No burn mechanism; tokens distributed as rewards for rendering tasks.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Operated by OTOY Inc. with decentralized network aspects.
token_design_thinking.tech_design: Utilizes decentralized GPU networks for rendering tasks.
token_design_thinking.team: Founded by Jules Urbach with a background in rendering technology.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Decentralized indexing protocol for querying blockchain data.
principles: Promoting open data access and decentralized governance.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Essential infrastructure for Web3 data querying.

economic_design.details: Continuous inflationary issuance to indexers; no burn mechanism.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Managed by The Graph Foundation with decentralized governance.

token_design_thinking.positioning: Prominent metaverse platform with strong brand partnerships.

economic_design.details: No burn mechanism; tokens used for staking, governance, and platform transactions.

tokenomics.emissions: Tokens burned during LAND auctions; no ongoing emission.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Interoperable network of blockchains (the 'Internet of Blockchains').
token_design_thinking.positioning: Pioneer in cross-chain interoperability and modular blockchain development.

economic_design.model: Inflationary Proof-of-Stake with staking rewards and fee burning.
economic_design.details: ATOM is used for staking, governance, and transaction fees. Inflation rate is dynamic (currently ~10-12%), with staking rewards distributed to validators and delegators. Fee burning and slashing introduce deflationary pressure.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Open-source, decentralized network with governance by token holders.
token_design_thinking.tech_design: Cosmos SDK, Tendermint BFT consensus, IBC protocol for cross-chain communication.
token_design_thinking.power_structures: On-chain governance with validator and delegator voting.
token_design_thinking.team: Developed by the Interchain Foundation, Ignite (Tendermint), and a global open-source community.

tokenomics.total_supply: Dynamic (no max supply, ~390,930,671 as of June 2024)
tokenomics.emissions: Inflationary, dynamic (targeting 7-20% historically, currently ~10-12%). Staking rewards distributed to validators and delegators.
tokenomics.burn: Fee burning (portion of transaction fees), slashing (malicious/offline validators), and governance proposal deposits (if vetoed) are burned.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Decentralized exchange for perpetual futures trading.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Bridging the gap between centralized and decentralized exchanges.

economic_design.model: Utility and governance token with staking rewards.
economic_design.details: Used for transaction fees, staking, and governance participation.

token_design_thinking.legal_design: Operates under a decentralized governance model.
token_design_thinking.tech_design: Custom Layer-1 blockchain with HyperBFT consensus mechanism.
token_design_thinking.team: Founded by a team from Caltech, MIT, and other institutions.

token_design_thinking.purpose: Enterprise-grade public network for decentralized applications.
principles: Fairness and security through hashgraph consensus.
token_design_thinking.positioning: Alternative to traditional blockchains with unique consensus mechanism.

tokenomics.emissions: Ongoing emissions to incentivize network participation.
